channel.title: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?

item.title: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

No see thats how i had the D plate working when i was using diffrent models… this is what im talking about.

3 model: Shard, slice, lump

i want it to be if i use the shard on the slice while “having” the lump in the inv then it would delete them all and replace with a d plate?

and then i want if i use shard + slice with no lump it gives message missing lump ( but i know how to do this 1)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?

item.title: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

the two codes you already have up there…

lets say… if you combine those two you get 1111
so now do another “useitem”

if ((itemUsed == 1111) && (useWith == ####)) { deleteItem(1111, getItemSlot(####), 1); lowGFX(482,0); setAnimation(3157); addItem(13665, 1); sM("You Combine The Lump & Shard With the Slice and get a Dragon Plate!"); }

if that didn’t help… i’m sorry ;\

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?

item.title: How can i make 3 items combine and delete and make 1?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

well i’ve been using this code for the D plate. but then i found out i was making it the wrong way -_-…
how could i change this line of code so that if i use one item on another while it has another item in the inv that it would delete all 3 and replace with one?

if ((itemUsed == 13669) && (useWith == 22)) { deleteItem(13669, getItemSlot(13669), 1); deleteItem(22, getItemSlot(20), 1); lowGFX(482,0); setAnimation(3157); addItem(13665, 1); sM("You Combine The Lump & Shard With the Slice and get a Dragon Plate!"); }

Read full topic
